lead_paragraph: USA Basketball has changed its plan and will select the 12 players headed to Beijing before they report to Las Vegas for a training camp later this month. The original idea called for the team to have up to 16 players in camp and cut down to 12 on June 30. Jerry Colangelo, the managing director of USA Basketball, said the team would most likely be announced after the completion of the N.B.A. finals.
